original_text: So Eleazar the priest took the bronze censers, which those who were burned had offered, and they were hammered out as a covering for the altar,
korean_text: 제사장 엘르아살이 불탄 자들이 드렸던 놋 향로를 가져다가 쳐서 제단을 싸서

sentences.original_text: So Eleazar the priest took the bronze censers,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 제사장 엘르아살이 놋 향로들을 가져왔고,

sentences.original_text: which those who were burned had offered,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 불타 죽은 자들이 드렸던 것이었고,

sentences.original_text: as a covering for the altar,
